name: Pulses - Crystal Journeys
description: Match 3 is so 2016. Pulses - Crystal Journeys is a lascivious love letter to Tetris and Lumines, but with bombs. Crush your last candy, and come explore the wonderful, fast-paced world of...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Inter Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 Graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: This game requires a mouse.
